Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Staff”
Reviews.Author: mark B
Reviews.Content: stayed week march 2012 ive stayed 90night separate living kitchen bedroom recently upgraded pool jacuzzi nice breakfast included breakfast offered continental staff extremely friendly helpful address location major loud highway heard pool surrounding little depressed short drives local attractions restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, and wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: megan b
Reviews.Content: tremendously impressed staff hotel bent backwards stay comfortable extra mile help family stay hotel nice absolutely recommend hotel staying anytime dallas

Reviews.Title: “more than expected”
Reviews.Author: Richard M
Reviews.Content: actually picked wrong hotel booking online disappointed arrived hotel staff excellent front desk cleaning crew hotel construction disturb trip convenient drive fairgrounds downtown time drive fort worth suite loved convenience kitchen recommend location staying dallas complaint wireless internet

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Beyond Amazing”
Reviews.Author: Jill R
Reviews.Content: imagine hotel staff driving packages event 2 miles happened morning shuttle busy drove car event delayed fedex trade packages arrived hotel drove 4 boxes loading dock mention dropped hotel late night bit anxiety walking outside location safe nervous woman desk immediately requested security escort walked truly amazing note actually 2 sized bedrooms closing doors living kitchen

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff, comfortable rooms!”
Reviews.Author: spectrecat
Reviews.Content: blown kindness courtesy staff comfortable family kids love freeway noise wasnt bad probably look difficult location time farther dfw thats hotels fault repairing staircases interfere stay consider property ohand disney dealbreaker consider

Reviews.Title: “Ok place, but not up to normal Residence Inn standards”
Reviews.Author: sailor11101
Reviews.Content: family stayed hotel visiting dallas chose location due quick access times downtown dallas kitchen separate bedrooms location dirty hotel parking lot dirty trash lobby decent special dated lots kitchenette hotel pool hot tub cold try didnt spend time hotel checking sights pros lots access dallas kitchenette breakfast cons dated clean noisy

Reviews.Title: “spacious rooms but noisy and not proper cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: AGall0
Reviews.Content: spacious confortable kitchenette dining lcd tv separated bedroom unfortunately sound proof easily hear noise cars highway hotel organised seven buildings winter time coat lobby breakfast walking distance highway accessible foot cab cross worst checked black hair bathroom floor service lady coffee filter brewer machine worse day hair bathroom coffee filter bed sheets pulled straight blanket pulled service lady checklist details basic cleaning items left hotel day earlier luckly found available elsewhere corporate rate anyway staff helpfull providing sort information directions
